events.message: I received my order yesterday, but I want to return it and get a refund because the product is not what I expected.
The issue was classified as a refund request based on the customer's explanation of wanting a return and money back.
The case was assigned to the customer service agent specializing in refunds and returns for faster assistance.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. I understand you want to process a refund. I'm here to help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the return so I can proceed with your refund request?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The product does not match the description on your website, so I'd like a full refund.
Thank you for the information. We have initiated your refund process, and you will receive the amount back within 5-7 business days.
Thanks for the quick response! I appreciate the help and look forward to receiving my refund soon.
The refund request has been resolved successfully. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Just checking in to confirm if you have received your refund and if everything was handled to your satisfaction.
Yes, I got the refund yesterday. Everything was perfect, thank you for the great support!
The case has been formally closed after confirming the successful refund and positive customer feedback.
We have sent a satisfaction survey to your email. Please feel free to share your experience with our service.
